caption.p: Analysis and stereological parameters of tibia proximal region in WT and gal-8 Tg mice

fn.p: 14-week-old WT and Tg mice (n = 7 each group) were scanned using a small animal in vivo μCT scanner. Tibial bones were removed from 16-week-old WT and Tg mice (n = 5 each group) and scanned using an in vitro CT scanner. Analysis was performed on the proximal region of the tibia. The parameters calculated are Tb.N (trabecular number), Tb.Sp (trabecular separation), BV/TV (bone volume/tissue volume), and BMD (bone mineral density). Results shown are mean values ± SEM. BMD is given as relative to the average BMD of WT mice (**p < 0.01 vs WT mice).
